member.name: T:AssetReader.Abstractions.IAssetReader
member.summary: Represents a device that reads or scans for assets. An example of such a device might be a barcode scanner or an RFID reader that can scan IDs of books in a library.

member.name: M:AssetReader.Abstractions.IAssetReader.IsReady
member.summary: Checks if the reader is ready to read assets.
member.returns: Returns true if the reader is ready.
